name: Departure (itch)
description:
A simple thought. A simple game. 

This game was made during my first game jam. Its a simple walking sim with a somewhat simple story behind it. I wanted to tell a story through the mix of architecture and gameplay, and thats what I've attempted to do. 

Music by Kevin MacLeod :"Soaring" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
